OpenSim::Units

Units Class Reference

#include <Units.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing various units for measuring quantities.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0

  simmUnknownUnits = 0, simmRadians, simmDegrees, simmMillimeters,
  simmCentimeters, simmMeters, simmSeconds, simmMilliseconds,
  simmNewtons
}
